main event: A civilian observed an unidentified flying object in Dayton, Ohio on 15 September 23.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for only 4 seconds,The object was reported to be moving course north,The individual was driving a car at a speed of 50 miles per hour when the object was spotted,The observer has a background as an Aero Researcher for USARC,The object appeared to stand still at one point during the observation.
witness description: Civilian, Aero Researcher for USARC, Male, Age 30
